# Welcome to Manuel Rausch's website!

I am a research associate in Psychology and Cognitive Neuroscience based at the [Rhine-Waal University of Applied Sciences](https://www.hochschule-rhein-waal.de/en). My research interests include

* Metacognition 
* Cognitive modeling
* Mathematical modeling of behaviour
* Perceptual decision making
* Confidence in perceptual decision making
* Visual awareness
* Meta-Psychology
* Machine learning and Psychology

![ ](img/Download.png)

I signed the [commitment to research transparency and open science](http://www.researchtransparency.org). 

![ ](img/rt_logo_very_wide.png)

Please feel free to [contact me](mailto:manuel.rausch@hochschule-rhein-waal.de) if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential projects.
